basics.titel: Andres Cardenas Portfolio de Desarrollo y Programador
basics.description: Passionate about continuous learning. I am a Junior Web Developer and Systems Analyst. From Bogota, Colombia. Committed to excellence and innovation in every project I undertake
basics.name: Andres Mauricio Cardenas Sanchez
basics.label: Developer and Software Engineer
basics.summary: I am professional passionate about programming and technology, with outstanding experience in multimedia support, service desk management, web development and logistics management. My background includes a solid command of tools such as Visual Studio Code, Node.js, JavaScript, Docker and Linux. In addition, I am immersed in the study and practical application of languages such as JavaScrip and Python
basics.summary2: My commitment to continuous improvement drives me to stay updated in a constantly evolving technological environment. I am dedicated to expanding my programming skills and exploring new technologies that drive innovation and efficiency in every project I participate in.
basics.summary3: Explore my Portfolio to discover more about my projects, skills and how I can contribute to the success of your team or project.

work.name: CooprofesoresUn
work.summary: I am specializing in the development of web applications, excelling in the creation of innovative solutions. My experience includes first and second level multimedia support, with a focus on service desk management. However, where I really shine is in supporting the development of our own web applications, using tools such as HTML, CSS, JS and NodeJS. My experience includes efficient deployment through Docker containers.

work.name: Inversiones Lejis S.A.S
work.summary: Durin my work experience, I successfully managed inventory control and product rotation, analyzing variations to identify causes and develop action plans. I efficiently carried out weekly and monthly inventory counts, optimizing processes to ensure accuracy and goal achievement. As responsible for logistics, I coordinated orders, reception, storage, preservation, rotation, exhibition and dispatches, focused on ensuring customer satisfaction and achieving sales goals. In addition, I supervised the operation, maintaining equipment and infrastructure, prioritizing daily cleaning and safety with immediate incident reports.

work.name: Alpina S.A
work.summary: Like Administrator, I acquired key skills in inventory management and logistics during my work experience. I led inventory taking, ensured compliance with quality standards, and coordinated order logistics, storage and display. My focus on operational efficiency included maintaining equipment and infrastructure, ensuring daily safety and cleanliness. I handled the petty cash with precision, managing the collection and recording of sales. My strategic contribution and precise execution could be a valuable asset to your team, combining technical skills with a results-oriented approach.
